testcase.name: Load Walch QA Login page and login
Verify ability to open My Resources
Verify Test Generator appears
Click Next, Verify Add New Learning Resource dialog appears
- some other steps go here as or if this evolves -
Confirm Create New Assessment Wizard has loaded
Verify the'Create a test based on Common Core State Standards.' radio button
Verify the 'Create a new test based on curriculum materials.' radio button
Check for preview pane message
Fill out step 1 of the Create New Assessment Wizard form
Verify n/50 characters for test name
Verify n/50 characters for description
Verify navigation from step 1 to step 2
Confirm contents of Preview panel
Create a new test based on curriculum materials. (currently not implemented)
Verify Test Topics has expected elements:
Verify “Choose topics by standard” works by choosing a subject, a level and a domain
Click Check boxes
Verify Preview sidebar updates
Click Next, verify Test Topics loads

failure.message: Selector '.item-topic' was not visible after 60240 milliseconds.

testcase.name: Choose types and quantities to include
Verify preview works
Verify Select Items / Test Items age of wizard
Verify Test Settings
Verify ability to Finish creating an assessment
Verify existence of assessment by explicitly deleting it
verify “Choose a subject, a level and a domain, then choose which standards you wish to cover by checking the box next to the appropiate standards.” (currently this is misspelled)
// at some point randomization or testing of each possible value here would make sense, today Mathematics only)
Verify Subject selector by making a selection
Verify Level by making a selection
Verify Domain by making a selection
Verify ability to select all/each topic
Verify preview panel is updated
Verify ability to deselect some topics ( 1 random from count)
Click Next, verify Item Types loads
